verses.verse: וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall be if שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> And it shall come to pass if thou shalt hearken תִּשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> diligently בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> to observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> [and] to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4687><s%> all his commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day וּנְתָ֨נְךָ֜ <S%H5414><s%> will set יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God עֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> thee on high עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> above all nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וּבָ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come עָלֶ֛יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַבְּרָכ֥וֹת <S%H1293><s%> And all these blessings הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְהִשִּׂיגֻ֑ךָ <S%H5381><s%> on thee and overtake כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if תִשְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> thee if thou shalt hearken בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you in בָּעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> [shalt] thou [be] in the city וּבָר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you in בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> [shalt] thou [be] in the field

בָּר֧וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed פְּרִֽי־ <S%H6529><s%> [shall be] the fruit בִטְנְךָ֛ <S%H990><s%> of thy body וּפְרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> and the fruit אַדְמָתְךָ֖ <S%H127><s%> of thy ground וּפְרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> and the fruit בְהֶמְתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H929><s%> of thy cattle שְׁגַ֥ר <S%H7698><s%> the increase אֲלָפֶ֖יךָ <S%H504><s%> of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּר֥וֹת <S%H6251><s%> and the flocks צֹאנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6629><s%> of thy sheep
בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed טַנְאֲךָ֖ <S%H2935><s%> [shall be] thy basket וּמִשְׁאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H4863><s%> and thy store

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you בְּבֹאֶ֑ךָ <S%H935><s%> [shalt] thou [be] when thou comest in וּבָר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you בְּצֵאתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3318><s%> [shalt] thou [be] when thou goest out

יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> shall cause יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H341><s%> thine enemies הַקָּמִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> that rise up עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against נִגָּפִ֖ים <S%H5062><s%> against thee to be smitten לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before thy face בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> against thee one יֵצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> they shall come out אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> against וּבְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> thee seven דְרָכִ֖ים <S%H1870><s%> ways יָנ֥וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> and flee לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

יְצַ֨ו <S%H6680><s%> shall command יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּרָכָ֔ה <S%H1293><s%> the blessing בַּאֲסָמֶ֕יךָ <S%H618><s%> upon thee in thy storehouses וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H4916><s%> and in all that thou settest יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וּבֵ֣רַכְךָ֔ <S%H1288><s%> unto and he shall bless בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָֽךְ׃

יְקִֽימְךָ֨ <S%H6965><s%> shall establish יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> thee an holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> to himself נִֽשְׁבַּֽע־ <S%H7650><s%> unto himself as he hath sworn לָ֑ךְ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if תִשְׁמֹ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> unto thee if thou shalt keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹת֙ <S%H4687><s%> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <S%H1980><s%> and walk בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ <S%H1870><s%> in his ways

וְרָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> shall see כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> And all people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> by שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> by the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> that thou art called עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and they וְיָֽרְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> and they shall be afraid מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וְהוֹתִרְךָ֤ <S%H3498><s%> shall make thee plenteous יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לְטוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> in goods בִּפְרִ֧י <S%H6529><s%> in the fruit בִטְנְךָ֛ <S%H990><s%> of thy body וּבִפְרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> and in the fruit בְהַמְתְּךָ֖ <S%H929><s%> of thy cattle וּבִפְרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> and in the fruit אַדְמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H127><s%> of thy ground עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָֽךְ׃

יִפְתַּ֣ח <S%H6605><s%> shall open יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְ֠ךָ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוֹצָר֨וֹ <S%H214><s%> treasure הַטּ֜וֹב <S%H2896><s%> unto thee his good אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heaven לָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> to give מְטַֽר־ <S%H4306><s%> the rain אַרְצְךָ֙ <S%H776><s%> unto thy land בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <S%H6256><s%> in his season וּלְבָרֵ֕ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and to bless אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> all the work יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand וְהִלְוִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H3867><s%> and thou shalt lend גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> unto many וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִלְוֶֽה׃ <S%H3867><s%> and thou shalt not borrow

וּנְתָֽנְךָ֨ <S%H5414><s%> shall make יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לְרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> thee the head וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not לְזָנָ֔ב <S%H2180><s%> and not the tail וְהָיִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but לְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and thou shalt be above only וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְמָ֑טָּה <S%H4295><s%> and thou shalt not be beneath כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if תִשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> if that thou hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִצְוֹ֣ת ׀ <S%H4687><s%> unto the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> to observe וְלַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> and to do

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תָס֗וּר <S%H5493><s%> And thou shalt not go aside מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הַדְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> from any of the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> which I command אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day יָמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <S%H8040><s%> or [to] the left לָלֶ֗כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> other לְעָבְדָֽם׃ <S%H5647><s%> to serve ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> But it shall come to pass if thou wilt not hearken בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> to observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתָ֣יו <S%H4687><s%> all his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <S%H2708><s%> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day וּבָ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come עָלֶ֛יךָ <S%H5921><s%> that כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַקְּלָל֥וֹת <S%H7045><s%> that all these curses הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְהִשִּׂיגֽוּךָ׃ <S%H5381><s%> upon thee and overtake

אָר֥וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you in בָּעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> [shalt] thou [be] in the city וְאָר֥וּר <S%H779><s%> and cursed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you in בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> [shalt] thou [be] in the field
אָר֥וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed טַנְאֲךָ֖ <S%H2935><s%> [shall be] thy basket וּמִשְׁאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H4863><s%> and thy store

אָר֥וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed פְּרִֽי־ <S%H6529><s%> [shall be] the fruit בִטְנְךָ֖ <S%H990><s%> of thy body וּפְרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> and the fruit אַדְמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H127><s%> of thy land שְׁגַ֥ר <S%H7698><s%> the increase אֲלָפֶ֖יךָ <S%H504><s%> of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּר֥וֹת <S%H6251><s%> and the flocks צֹאנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6629><s%> of thy sheep

אָר֥וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you בְּבֹאֶ֑ךָ <S%H935><s%> [shalt] thou [be] when thou comest in וְאָר֥וּר <S%H779><s%> and cursed אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you בְּצֵאתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3318><s%> [shalt] thou [be] when thou goest out

יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> shall send יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּ֠ךָ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּאֵרָ֤ה <S%H3994><s%> upon thee cursing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּהוּמָה֙ <S%H4103><s%> vexation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּגְעֶ֔רֶת <S%H4045><s%> and rebuke בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H4916><s%> in all that thou settest יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> because תַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> unto for to do עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until הִשָּֽׁמֶדְךָ֤ <S%H8045><s%> until thou be destroyed וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and until אֲבָדְךָ֙ <S%H6><s%> and until thou perish מַהֵ֔ר <S%H4118><s%> quickly מִפְּנֵ֛י <S%H6440><s%> because רֹ֥עַ <S%H7455><s%> of the wickedness מַֽעֲלָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H4611><s%> of thy doings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> because עֲזַבְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H5800><s%> whereby thou hast forsaken

יַדְבֵּ֧ק <S%H1692><s%> cleave יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּךָ֖ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> shall make the pestilence עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלֹּת֣וֹ <S%H3615><s%> unto thee until he have consumed אֹֽתְךָ֔ <S%H853><s%> מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> from הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> thee from off the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

יַכְּכָ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> shall smite יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בַּשַּׁחֶ֨פֶת <S%H7829><s%> thee with a consumption וּבַקַּדַּ֜חַת <S%H6920><s%> and with a fever וּבַדַּלֶּ֗קֶת <S%H1816><s%> and with an inflammation וּבַֽחַרְחֻר֙ <S%H2746><s%> and with an extreme burning וּבַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and with the sword וּבַשִּׁדָּפ֖וֹן <S%H7711><s%> and with blasting וּבַיֵּרָק֑וֹן <S%H3420><s%> and with mildew וּרְדָפ֖וּךָ <S%H7291><s%> and they shall pursue עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until אָבְדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6><s%> thee until thou perish

וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁמֶ֛יךָ <S%H8064><s%> And thy heaven אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is over רֹאשְׁךָ֖ <S%H7218><s%> that [is] over thy head נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> shall be brass וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תַּחְתֶּ֖יךָ <S%H8478><s%> is under בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> that is under thee [shall be] iron
